attributes.action: make the inclusion of solar panel compulsory in all new build properties, domestic or commercial.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By legislating the installation of solar panels in all new build properties within the UK, either domestic or commercial, the Government will be taking a solid, constructive step in reducing the UK's carbon footprint rather than just raising more taxes.
The benefits will be:
-The cost of installation at the build stage will be minimized.
-The new owners/tenants will benefit from reduced power bills.
-Reduction in demand from all new builds from other power sources.
-The increase in demand for Solar panels/equipment and maintenance will not only drive costs down but also create employment.
-Reduction in costs will make the installation cheaper for existing buildings.
